record.title: CONCLUSION OF MORNING BUSINESS
record.narrative:
CONCLUSION OF MORNING BUSINESS -- (Senate - April 22, 2008)

[Page: S3221]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent to speak for 10 minutes on the bill.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, would the clerk report the motion to proceed to the bill at this point, or should I proceed?

record.chair: It is appropriate to close morning business and then report the motion to proceed.
